subject: Re: [junit] Re: Mock and collections.

Luiz Siqueira Neto wrote:

> For make a test I first create a "MockEntity" and than I create a test
> to force the "state machine development". Tell me what you think about
> this way of test.

Maybe I don't understand, but why do you test a mock entity? I use mock 
objects to test /other/ objects, but I don't test the mock objects 
themselves.

Here, you have a mock entity and a mock container. Which one are you 
testing?

> I really appreciate this conversation. :)

Thank you. I hope you will continue to appreciate it when I criticize 
more. :)
